title: Natural Daylighting
subtitle: Using Natural Light in Sustainable Buildings
about:
Sustainable buildings use windows or other openings and reflective
surfaces to provides effective internal lighting using sunlight. Energy
use can be reduced by using less electric lights. You can compare a
regular window and a reflector window in the following simulation.

Right-click the link to download the model:
[natural-daylighting.e2d](e2d/natural-daylighting.e2d)
{: align="center"}
